title: Societies and clubs
text: See also: Periodic Table of Societies

title: How to categorise a page
text:
How to categorise a page
If using the Visual Editor, click on the "Page Options" dropdown and go to the "Categories" options as shown in the adjacent image. If using the source editor, use the [[Category:Societies and clubs]] tag on any wiki page to put that article into this category (eg. see the source for Ambar ).
Please add your society to the category Societies and Clubs if it isn't shown in the list below. If the society has no wiki page , please create one by following this guide .

title: Societies Without Wiki Pages
text:
• Institute Wellness Group (IWG)
• CGS IIT-KGP
• Society of Petroleum Engineers
• Click KGP Click KGP Blog
